column4: hello i am from knoppix because my ubuntu does not start anymore!!! i have tried to install nvidia drivers and when i have finished the procedure i hit Ctrl-Alt-Canc...but since then when i boot up my pc (i use floppy boot grub) it stops when saying:"Ok uncompressing linux...ok booting the kernel "  after this appears a black screen and nothing appens or is displayed...help me!!!
have ou tried a different kernel?
yes but now i cant boot from ubuntu
:( um. have you mounted your ubuntu /etc/ into your knoppix? you can edit the xorg.conf from there :)
sure you didnt edit anythign else at the same time?
you can select modules to load
yesterday one on a channel has suggested me tp dp spmething with GRUB..? ar u agree?
yes, but it depends what you put in :)
so what can i try to do now?
can you mount your ubuntu partition?
i m in that partition now
